titleStmt.title: The pursuit of peace. Briefly explained and plainly propounded in a sermon preached on the 29.th day of March, 1660. Unto a solemne assembly of the parishioners of the parish of Botolphs Algate London; on the composure of their late unhappie and too long continued differences. By Z.C. their unworthy pastor.
titleStmt.author: Crofton, Zachary, 1625 or 6-1672.

titleStmt.title: The pursuit of peace. Briefly explained and plainly propounded in a sermon preached on the 29.th day of March, 1660.
